009package Ch03_PointOperations;
010
011import static imagingbook.common.math.Arithmetic.sqr;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
017import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramUtils;
018
019/**
020 * <p>
021 * ImageJ plugin, adapts image intensities to match a Gaussian distribution
022 * with specified parameters &mu;, &sigma; ({@link #Mean}, {@link #StdDev}).
023 * The current active image is modified, the histogram and cumulative histogram
024 * of the resulting image are displayed.
025 * See Sec. 3.6.4 (Fig. 3.15) of [1] for additional details.
026 * </p>
027 * <p>
028 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing - An Algorithmic Approach</em>,
029 * 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
030 * </p>
031 * 
032 * @author WB
033 * 
034 * @see HistogramUtils
035 * @see HistogramPlot
036 *
037 */
038public class Match_To_Gaussian_Histogram implements PlugInFilter {
039        
040        public static double Mean = 128;
041        public static double StdDev = 128;
042        
043        @Override
044        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
045                return DOES_8G;
046        }
047        
048        @Override
049        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
050                
051                // get histograms
052                int[] hi = ip.getHistogram();
053                int[] hG = makeGaussianHistogram(Mean, StdDev);
054                                
055                (new HistogramPlot(hi, "Image Histogram")).show();
056                (new HistogramPlot(hG, "Gaussian Histogram")).show();
057                
058                double[] nhG = HistogramUtils.normalizeMax(hG);
059                (new HistogramPlot(nhG, "Gaussian Hist. normalized")).show();
060                
061                double[] chG = HistogramUtils.cdf(hG);
062        (new HistogramPlot(chG, "Gaussian Hist. cumulative")).show();
063                
064        int[] F = HistogramUtils.matchHistograms(hi, hG);
065                
066//              for (int i = 0; i < F.length; i++) {
067//                      IJ.log(i + " -> " + F[i]);
068//              }
069                
070                ip.applyTable(F);
071                int[] hAm = ip.getHistogram();
072                (new HistogramPlot(hAm, "Histogram A (mod)")).show();
073                (new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(hAm), "Cumulative Histogram A (mod)")).show();
074        }
075        
076        private int[] makeGaussianHistogram (double mean, double sigma) {
077                int[] h = new int[256];
078                double sigma2 = 2 * sqr(sigma);
079                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
080                        double x = mean - i;
081                        double g = Math.exp(-sqr(x) / sigma2) / sigma;
082                        h[i] = (int) Math.round(10000 * g);
083                }
084                return h;
085        }
086
087}
088
